section.section: In accordance with the State budget, the Secretary shall appoint the employees that the Secretary considers necessary for the efficient administration of the Department.
The Secretary shall make each appointment from a list of eligible candidates in accordance with the State Personnel and Pensions Article.

text.section:
Each appointee to the Department shall:
be a resident of the State on the date of appointment; and
have the character, education, and other qualifications established by the Secretary under this title.
